venue.address_2: Congress Street across from City Hall
venue.name: Faneuil Hall (in front of the Samuel Adams statue)

item.description:
BOSTON TEA PARTY 2010
http://www.masslpa.or...

The Liberty Preservation Assoc. of Massachusetts (MassLPA) is chief sponsor of BTP2010 annual event in "The Cradle of Liberty" - Faneuil Hall, Boston, Massachusetts 02109, on 12-12-2010, between 12:00 - 5:00 pm.

BTP2010 has a Great Line-up of Powerful Speakers and Liberty & Freedom Leaders from around the country!
A Call to Action for Building Beyond the 2010 Successes of the Power of the Ballot Box!

SPEAKERS Confirmed:
GOV. GARY JOHNSON - former Governor of New Mexico
G. EDWARD GRIFFIN - Author: The Creature from Jekyll Island
STEWART RHODES - Founder of Oath Keepers
SHERIFF RICHARD MACK - Author: County Sheriff, America's Last Hope
GARY FRANCHI - Founder of Restore the Republic
PATRIOT PASTOR GARRETT LEAR - The Patriot Pastor - Pastor to Patriots
DAVID R. GILLIE - Rediscovery of the American Civic Creed
ADAM KOKESH - Iraqi Veterans Against the War
JEN COFFEY - Second Amendment Sisters
JORDAN PAGE - liberty songwriter/musician
CARLA HOWELL - Center for Small Government
PETER SCHIFF - EuroPacific Capital

We are selling 700 general admission tickets. Advance: $25. Door: $30.
We are selling 100 VIP tickets for $100 ea. - preferred seating in the Faneuil Hall, first 4 rows and dinner with speakers ($25.00 voucher at Durgin Park after the event 6:00-9:00pm) Only 72 left

We are reserving a number of rooms at a reduced rate at the Omni Parker House. Contact Bob Dwyer asap with you request.

Corporate/Group/Individual sponsor space available in the event program booklet.

We are renting table space for - $100 ea. (3”x 3”)
For ticket reservations, table reservations or co-sponsorship please contact:

Bob Dwyer at 508-930-5530 begin_of_the_skype_highlighting              508-930-5530      end_of_the_skype_highlighting
or Bob.Dwyer@MassLPA.org

Ticket purchase by check or money order made payable to MassLPA, mail to:

MassLPA
496 Reed Rd
Dartmouth MA 02747
Please include your return address for ticket mailing.

Thank you in advance
Sincerely,
Bob Dwyer
President – MassLPA

Historic Faneuil Hall

item.name: BOSTON TEA PARTY 2010 - Gary Johnson, Peter Schiff and More!
